snippet: A document obtained by The Times shows the wording suggested by advisers for Mr. Trump’s replies to questions about race, religion and racism....
abstract: Leaked document reveals Donald Trump's planned visit to black church in Detroit, Great Faith Ministries International, was to be entirely scripted affair, detailing 12 questions Bishop Wayne T Jackson would ask Trump as well as planned answers; is unusual for campaign to prepare script for candidate's responses to interview questions, and document reveals how important visit to church is for Trump, who has history of offending sensibilities of black Americans.
lead_paragraph: A document obtained by The Times shows the wording suggested by advisers for Mr. Trump’s replies to questions about race, religion and racism.

headline.main: Leaked Script Shows What Advisers Want Donald Trump to Say at Black Church
headline.print_headline: To Court Blacks, a Trump Script
